#done
#notsubmitted

import sys
for _ in xrange(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    s=sys.stdin.readline()
    s=s.split()
   # print "s is",s
    k=int(s[0])
    n=int(s[1])
    s=sys.stdin.readline()
    s=s.split()
    s=map(int,s)
    s.sort()
    #print "sorted s",s
    if s[0]>k:
        print "No"
        continue
    i=1
    possible=True
    while i<len(s)-1:
        if s[i+1]>s[i]+k:
            possible=False
            break
        i+=1
    if possible==True:
        print "Yes"
    else: print "No"
